location.zh-cn: 美国密苏里州克雷夫科尔

description.zh-cn: 一家美国农业生物技术公司，曾是全球转基因种子的领先生产商。2018年被拜耳公司收购。
description.en: An American agricultural biotechnology corporation that was a leading producer of genetically engineered seeds. It was acquired by Bayer in 2018.

description.zh-cn: 孟山都公司的创始人，在医药行业拥有30年经验。
description.en: The founder of Monsanto Company, with 30 years of experience in the pharmaceutical industry.

description.zh-cn: 德国制药及化工跨国集团，于2018年收购了孟山都公司。
description.en: A German multinational pharmaceutical and chemical corporation that acquired Monsanto in 2018.

description.zh-cn: 孟山都公司创始人约翰·奎恩伊之子，于1928年接任公司董事长。
description.en: Son of Monsanto founder John Francis Queeny, who took over as chairman of the company in 1928.

description.zh-cn: 由孟山都和德国拜耳公司合作成立的生产聚氨酯的公司。
description.en: A company established as a joint venture between Monsanto and the German company Bayer to produce polyurethanes.

nodes.id: 托马斯和霍奇瓦尔特实验室

zh-cn: 托马斯和霍奇瓦尔特实验室

description.zh-cn: 位于俄亥俄州代顿的实验室，被孟山都收购后成为其研发部。
description.en: A laboratory in Dayton, Ohio, which became Monsanto's research and development department after being acquired.

description.zh-cn: 美国化学家，随托马斯和霍奇瓦尔特实验室一同加盟孟山都，后官至公司总裁和董事会主席，并参与了曼哈顿计划。
description.en: An American chemist who joined Monsanto with Thomas & Hochwalt Laboratories, later becoming the company's president and chairman of the board, and participated in the Manhattan Project.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间，美国陆军领导的研发第一颗原子弹的计划。
description.en: A research and development undertaking during World War II that produced the first nuclear weapons, led by the United States Army.

description.zh-cn: 1947年发生于美国德克萨斯城的工业事故，导致孟山都公司一家分厂被完全摧毁。
description.en: An industrial accident that occurred in Texas City, USA in 1947, which resulted in the complete destruction of a Monsanto plant.

description.zh-cn: 一种曾被广泛使用的合成杀虫剂，后因其对环境的长期影响而被禁用。
description.en: A synthetic insecticide that was once widely used but later banned due to its long-term environmental impacts.

description.zh-cn: 一种高效落叶剂，因含有剧毒的戴奥辛，对生态环境和人类健康造成严重损害。孟山都曾是其主要生产商之一。
description.en: A powerful defoliant containing highly toxic dioxin, which caused severe damage to the ecosystem and human health. Monsanto was one of its main producers.

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国，孟山都公司总部所在地，其军队在越南战争中使用了橙剂。
description.en: The United States of America, where Monsanto was headquartered. Its military used Agent Orange during the Vietnam War.

description.zh-cn: 孟山都公司的化学家，于1970年发明了除草剂草甘膦。
description.en: A chemist at Monsanto who invented the herbicide glyphosate in 1970.

description.zh-cn: 一种广谱除草剂，由孟山都公司商品化并以“Roundup”品牌销售。
description.en: A broad-spectrum herbicide, commercialized by Monsanto under the brand name Roundup.

description.zh-cn: 一家制药公司，于1985年被孟山都公司收购。
description.en: A pharmaceutical company that was acquired by Monsanto in 1985.

description.zh-cn: 在孟山都收购G.D.希尔勒公司后，由其阿斯巴甜业务部门成立的独立子公司。
description.en: An independent subsidiary formed from the aspartame business of G. D. Searle & Company after its acquisition by Monsanto.

description.zh-cn: 曾任阿斯巴甜公司总裁，后于1995年至2000年担任孟山都公司执行长。
description.en: Former president of the NutraSweet Company, who served as CEO of Monsanto from 1995 to 2000.

description.zh-cn: 1997年由孟山都公司的化学工业品和纤维制品部门分拆成立的公司。
description.en: A company spun off from Monsanto's chemical and fiber products divisions in 1997.

description.zh-cn: 一家遗传学公司，于1998年被孟山都公司完全收购。
description.en: A genetics company that was fully acquired by Monsanto in 1998.

description.zh-cn: 发明风味番茄的生物技术公司，于1997年被孟山都完全并购。
description.en: A biotechnology company that developed the Flavr Savr tomato, fully acquired by Monsanto in 1997.

description.zh-cn: 由孟山都与Pharmacia & Upjohn于1999年合并而成的制药巨头。后于2002年被辉瑞制药收购。
description.en: A pharmaceutical giant formed by the merger of Monsanto and Pharmacia & Upjohn in 1999. It was later acquired by Pfizer in 2002.

description.zh-cn: 美国跨国制药和生物技术公司，于2002年宣布收购Pharmacia。
description.en: An American multinational pharmaceutical and biotechnology corporation that announced its acquisition of Pharmacia in 2002.

description.zh-cn: 一种基因改造的牛科生长激素，注射后可增加乳牛的泌乳量。由孟山都研发，商品名为Posilac。
description.en: A genetically engineered bovine growth hormone that increases milk production in dairy cows. Developed by Monsanto under the brand name Posilac.

description.zh-cn: 美国制药公司，于2008年从孟山都手中收购了重组牛生长激素业务。
description.en: An American pharmaceutical company that acquired the recombinant bovine growth hormone business from Monsanto in 2008.

description.zh-cn: 一项全球性的示威游行活动，旨在反对孟山都公司及其生产的转基因生物产品。
description.en: A global protest movement against Monsanto Company and its genetically modified organism (GMO) products.

description.zh-cn: 国际非政府环保组织，曾反驳孟山都公司申请猪只育种技术的专利。
description.en: An international non-governmental environmental organization that opposed Monsanto's patent application for pig breeding technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国经济学者，曾批评孟山都控制中国大豆市场并指控其贿赂官员。
description.en: A Chinese economist who criticized Monsanto for controlling China's soybean market and accused it of bribery.

description.zh-cn: 曾任香港浸会大学校长，早年曾在孟山都公司担任高级化学研究师。
description.en: Former president of Hong Kong Baptist University, who previously worked at Monsanto as a Senior Research Chemist.

description.zh-cn: 一家生物技术公司，其开发的技术被孟山都公司用于农业应用生物技术的产业化经营模式。
description.en: A biotechnology company whose developed technologies were used by Monsanto in its industrialized business model for agricultural biotechnology applications.

description.zh-cn: 在此次战争中，美国军方大量使用了由孟山都等公司生产的落叶剂橙剂。
description.en: During this war, the U.S. military extensively used the defoliant Agent Orange, produced by companies including Monsanto.

description.zh-cn: 一家制药公司，于1999年与孟山都公司合并，组建了新的Pharmacia公司。
description.en: A pharmaceutical company that merged with Monsanto in 1999 to form the new Pharmacia corporation.

description.zh-cn: 约翰·奎恩伊于1901年在美国密苏里州圣路易斯市创立了孟山都公司。
description.en: John Francis Queeny founded Monsanto Company in St. Louis, Missouri, USA, in 1901.

description.zh-cn: 埃德加·孟山都·奎恩伊是孟山都创始人约翰·奎恩伊的儿子。
description.en: Edgar Monsanto Queeny was the son of Monsanto founder John Francis Queeny.

description.zh-cn: 1928年，埃德加·孟山都·奎恩伊接替其父成为孟山都公司的董事长。
description.en: In 1928, Edgar Monsanto Queeny succeeded his father as the Chairman of Monsanto Company.

description.zh-cn: 2018年6月7日，拜耳完成对孟山都的收购，孟山都成为拜耳旗下的一个品牌。
description.en: On June 7, 2018, Bayer completed the acquisition of Monsanto, making Monsanto a brand under Bayer.

description.zh-cn: 1954年，孟山都与德国化工巨头拜耳合作成立了“莫贝化学公司”。
description.en: In 1954, Monsanto and German chemical giant Bayer co-founded Mobay Chemical Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 1954年，拜耳与孟山都公司合作成立了“莫贝化学公司”。
description.en: In 1954, Bayer and Monsanto Company co-founded Mobay Chemical Corporation.

relationships.target: 托马斯和霍奇瓦尔特实验室

description.zh-cn: 1936年，孟山都公司收购了“托马斯和霍奇瓦尔特实验室”，并以此为基础成立了公司的研发部。
description.en: In 1936, Monsanto acquired Thomas & Hochwalt Laboratories and established its R&D department based on it.

description.zh-cn: 查尔斯·艾伦·托马斯于1936年随实验室一同加盟孟山都，曾任公司总裁（1951-1960）和董事会主席（1960-1965）。
description.en: Charles Allen Thomas joined Monsanto with the laboratory in 1936, serving as company President (1951-1960) and Chairman of the Board (1960-1965).

description.zh-cn: 孟山都的研发部承担了曼哈顿计划的一些研究工作，被称为代顿计划。
description.en: Monsanto's R&D department undertook some research work for the Manhattan Project, known as the Dayton Project.

description.zh-cn: 在1947年的德克萨斯城灾难中，孟山都公司的一家分厂被完全摧毁。
description.en: In the 1947 Texas City disaster, a Monsanto branch factory was completely destroyed.

description.zh-cn: 孟山都公司从1944年开始生产DDT，直到1972年美国立法禁用后停止生产。
description.en: Monsanto began producing DDT in 1944 and ceased production after it was banned by US law in 1972.

description.zh-cn: 从1960年代起，孟山都公司开始为美国军方生产在越南战争中使用的落叶剂橙剂。
description.en: Starting in the 1960s, Monsanto produced the defoliant Agent Orange for the U.S. military for use in the Vietnam War.

description.zh-cn: 美国军方在越南战争中大量使用橙剂作为落叶剂。
description.en: The U.S. military used Agent Orange extensively as a defoliant during the Vietnam War.

description.zh-cn: 孟山都公司的化学家John E. Franz于1970年发明了除草剂草甘膦。
description.en: Monsanto chemist John E. Franz invented the herbicide glyphosate in 1970.

description.zh-cn: 1985年，孟山都公司以2.7亿美元收购了G.D.希尔勒公司。
description.en: In 1985, Monsanto acquired G. D. Searle & Company for $270 million.

description.zh-cn: 1997年，孟山都将其化学工业品和纤维制品部门分拆出来，成立了首诺公司。
description.en: In 1997, Monsanto spun off its chemical and fiber products divisions to form Solutia Inc.

description.zh-cn: 孟山都公司于1998年完全收购了迪卡尔布遗传学公司。
description.en: Monsanto fully acquired DeKalb Genetics Corporation in 1998.

description.zh-cn: 1997年4月，孟山都公司完全并购了Calgene公司。
description.en: In April 1997, Monsanto fully acquired Calgene.

description.zh-cn: 1999年12月，孟山都与Pharmacia & Upjohn合并，组建了新的制药巨头Pharmacia公司。
description.en: In December 1999, Monsanto merged with Pharmacia & Upjohn to form the new pharmaceutical giant, Pharmacia.

description.zh-cn: 1999年12月，Pharmacia & Upjohn与孟山都合并，组建了新的制药巨头Pharmacia公司。
description.en: In December 1999, Pharmacia & Upjohn merged with Monsanto to form the new pharmaceutical giant, Pharmacia.

description.zh-cn: 2000年10月，Pharmacia公司将其农业子公司分拆，合并成一个名为“新孟山都”的新公司。
description.en: In October 2000, Pharmacia spun off its agricultural subsidiary, which was merged into a new company called the 'new Monsanto'.

description.zh-cn: 辉瑞制药于2002年声明收购Pharmacia，并于次年完成。
description.en: Pfizer announced the acquisition of Pharmacia in 2002, completing it the following year.

description.zh-cn: 孟山都公司于1994年发明了重组牛生长激素，并以商品名Posilac进行销售。
description.en: In 1994, Monsanto developed recombinant bovine growth hormone and marketed it under the trade name Posilac.

description.zh-cn: 2008年10月，礼来公司从孟山都公司收购了重组牛生长激素（Posilac）业务。
description.en: In October 2008, Eli Lilly and Company acquired the recombinant bovine growth hormone (Posilac) business from Monsanto.

description.zh-cn: 2013年5月25日，全球多个城市爆发了反对孟山都公司及其转基因生物的示威游行。
description.en: On May 25, 2013, protests against Monsanto and its genetically modified organisms were held in multiple cities worldwide.

description.zh-cn: 绿色和平组织反驳孟山都公司就猪只育种技术提交的专利申请，认为其企图将普通育种技术据为己有。
description.en: Greenpeace opposed Monsanto's patent application for pig breeding technology, arguing that the company was attempting to claim ownership of common breeding techniques.

description.zh-cn: 中国经济学者郎咸平批评孟山都控制了中国的大豆市场，并指控其贿赂农业部官员。
description.en: Chinese economist Larry Lang criticized Monsanto for controlling China's soybean market and accused it of bribing officials from the Ministry of Agriculture.

description.zh-cn: 香港浸会大学前校长陈新滋曾于孟山都公司工作多年，担任高级化学研究师。
description.en: Albert Sun-Chi Chan, former president of Hong Kong Baptist University, worked at Monsanto for many years as a Senior Research Chemist.

description.zh-cn: 孟山都公司在20世纪70年代末使用了由基因泰克等公司开发的技术，开创了其农业应用生物技术的产业化经营模式。
description.en: In the late 1970s, Monsanto used technology developed by companies like Genentech to pioneer its industrialized business model for agricultural biotechnology.
